title: Club Problem?
body: I lost the clubs i had / was in and when i try to remake the club with the same name i cant?

replies.body:
Yeh, the owners weren't put back into the clubs after the fix but everyone else was. So the club exists but doesn't show up for the owner. Other people can see your name in the club too, just your account doesnt say anything.

It's a known problem, so you can wait to see if they fix it, or send a support ticket

Thanks for submitting a ticket, as that's the best way to get this fixed. When support gets back to you they'll need this information, so if you want to speed it up, please add a reply to your ticket now with this info:

- Name of the Club
- Club Tag
- Summoner Names of other members of this Club or if the Club has an officer, the Summoner name of the Officer
- Can the other members of the Club see you as the Club owner?

To fix this they'll remove you from the club, hand ownership over to another member of your choosing, and then once you've been re-added to the club your chosen club member can hand ownership back to you.
Thank you, i have recieved the email now :)

im having the same problem im pretty sure it only effects club leaders

it still says my account is in the club but i cant accesses or see any of it

and i cant be reinvited to it because only my main acc has the admin privs
